articles.author: VOA News
articles.title: Biden announces new $225 million military aid package for Ukraine - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Zelenskyy says US needs to lift restrictions it places on the use of its weapons
articles.content:
President Joe Biden announced a significant new military aid package for Ukraine Thursday at the NATO summit in Washington.
The president made the announcement about the $225 million package during … [+2574 chars]
